author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maxima Grupe Reaches 100% In Emperia Holding After Mandatory Squeeze-Out
text:
May 18 (Reuters) - EMPERIA HOLDING SA:
* SAYS MAXIMA GRUPE REACHED 100% IN COMPANY AFTER MANDATORY SQUEEZE-OUT
* COMPANYâ€™S SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE ON JUNE 13 ON REMATERIALISATION OF SHARES AND WITHDRAWING THEM FROM TRADING ON WARSAW STOCK EXCHANGE
